title: Rainer Schaller
summary: Rainer Schaller (4 January 1969 – 21 October 2022) was a German entrepreneur. He was the Founder CEO of the RSG Group, which includes the McFit, John Reed and Gold's Gym fitness studios. He hit headlines as a result of the disaster at the 2010 Love Parade in Duisburg, which he organized. On 21 October 2022, Schaller and his son Aaron died in a private plane crash in Costa Rica.
